## The leaflet
```{r}
print(Sys.Date())
library("leaflet")
#leaflet() %>% addTiles() 
set.seed(2016-04-25)
df <- data.frame(lat = runif(20, min = 39.2, max = 39.3),
                 lng = runif(20, min = -76.6, max = -76.5))
df %>% leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers()

```
